items.title: Manicure
items.subTitle: Your nails are shaped and buffed and cuticles are conditioned and smoothed. This treatment is completed with a relaxing hand massage

items.title: Pedicure
items.subTitle: In addition to basic foot care manicure, including toenail clipping, nail and cuticle conditioning and callous treatment. You’ll enjoy a massaging foot scrub, paraffin foot therapy and stimulating massage with non-greasy butter cream for relief from the effects of stress. Your nails are buffed to a healthy glow.
